message: I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that. This offer considers the time pressure.
Meet me in the middle, considering the time pressure
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Getting closer, but I still need a bit more
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option, especially with time pressure.  Let's be reasonable and avoid losing everything.
